title: very wide and bold stencil sans
content:
Hello

Please apologogize for the poor quality of the draft.  
It is an “O” and surprysingly enough, I am looking for a font that look the same.

Thank you for your joyful help.

Logicalnot

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [TheOScreenshot.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060520210429/http:/typophile.com/files/TheOScreenshot.jpg) | 73.53 KB |
author: logicalnot

comments.content: Note : There is a gap in the middle that separate two half.

There’s [Eurostile Bold Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20060520210429/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.120852.0.10&attributes.sampleSize=288&sampleText=Oo&sampleSize=96), but it’s not quite as heavy as you need.

I checked [Mário Feliciano](http://web.archive.org/wiki/M%C3%A1rio%20Feliciano)’s [B-sides](http://web.archive.org/web/20060520210429/http:/www.vllg.com/Feliciano/B-Sides/mudTyper+Weights/), but couldn’t find anything amongst those.

I found this logo “MCM”  
 [http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?query\_id=3962543&page=1&mtype=&brand\_id=39025](http://web.archive.org/web/20060520210429/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?query_id=3962543&page=1&mtype=&brand_id=39025)

After an intensive google search, I wasn’t abble to find a font that may come from this design.

AAArrgh, I saw it once…

I did found my needs at MyFonts. For the record, here are the links.  
Thank you for your help.

Borg 9 from Larabie  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/borg-9/borg-9/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060520210429/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/borg-9/borg-9/)

Yonder Recoil from Larabie  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/yonder-recoil/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060520210429/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/yonder-recoil/)

Neuropolitical from Larabie  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/neuropolitical/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060520210429/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/neuropolitical/)

Senior Service from Larabie  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/senior-service/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060520210429/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/senior-service/)

No Clocks from Larabie  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/no-clocks/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060520210429/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/no-clocks/)

Rustproof Body from Larabie  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/rustproof-body/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060520210429/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/rustproof-body/)

Univox from Larabie  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/univox/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060520210429/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/univox/)
